中风患者的口服和肠道细菌与预后和死亡率较差有关根据一项在美国卒中的初步研究，通常在口腔和胃肠道中发现的一种普通细菌，链球菌肾上腺炎，链球菌肾上腺炎可能很丰富，并且与预后较差和死亡风险增加有关。协会的国际中风会议2025。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/oral-and-gut-bacteria-bacteria-in-sstroke-patients-patients-patients-patient-with-with-with-with-worse-prognosis-and-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/oral-and-gut-bacteria-bacteria-in-sstroke-patients-patients-patients-massiate-with-with-with-with-worse-prognosis-prognosis-and-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= e1668987-ce2c-4A18-A027-D3974BE24085 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 08:45:06 -0500 Oral and gut bacteria in stroke patients associated with worse prognosis and mortality
较短的端粒与年龄有关的脑部疾病风险更高染色体结束时具有较短保护帽的人（称为端粒）可能更有可能患上与年龄相关的脑部疾病，例如中风，痴呆症和晚期抑郁症（通常在60岁或以上诊断出）。研究将在2025年美国中风协会的国际中风会议上进行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/shorter-telomeres-linked-to-higher-to-higher-risk-of-age-age-age-age-age-age-age-age-brain-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/shorter-telomeres-linked-to-higher-risk-risk-risk-oge-gage-age-age-age-age-age-age-age-brain-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d65786e-3004-46bb-ad31-fa55555555555555555555555BF24061 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 08:39:01 -0500 Shorter telomeres linked to higher risk of age-related brain diseases

常规牙线牙线与降低中风和不规则心跳的风险有关根据在美国中风协会的2025年国际中风会议上提出的一项初步研究，每周至少每周至少每周一次牙齿可能与血凝块阻断脑血流和不规则心跳的较低的中风风险有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/regular-dental-flossing-link-to-link-to-lower-to-lower-risk-of-sstroke-of-sstroke-and-irregular-hardtbeats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/regular-dental-flossing-link----------------------------------------------------------------------- and-irregular-heardbeats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c68abee-54A4A4-4EF6-985F-6CBA4D8B1022 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 08:00:15 -0500 Regular dental flossing linked to lower risk of stroke and irregular heartbeats

研究确定了与增长的Covid-19死亡率风险有关的罕见疾病一项针对超过5800万人的英格兰范围内研究发现了八种罕见疾病，这些疾病在完全疫苗接种的个体中具有显着增加与共同相关死亡率的风险显着增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/study-Identifies-rare-diseases-link- covid-covid-covid-19-mortality-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/Study-identifies-rare-diseases-linked-to-increased-COVID-19-mortality-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c8bf9db-defe-4364-8C8B-66264EEA37F6 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 07:04:32 -0500 Study identifies rare diseases linked to increased COVID-19 mortality risks
抗抑郁药的焦虑降低证实，长期影响不确定一项新的Cochrane审查证实，抗抑郁药在试验条件下有效地减少了广义焦虑症（GAD）的症状，尽管长期使用的数据有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/Anxiety-reduction-with-antide-pressants-confirmed-long-term-effects-uncnert.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/Anxiety-reduction-with-antide-pressant-confirn-long-term-term-effects-uncney.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9fbfdad6-5E3B-47AA-A733-B459C069E121 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 06:59:11 -0500 Anxiety reduction with antidepressants confirmed, long-term effects uncertain
